div.span: Distance Learning begins Monday, April 6. The links below provide information to help navigate. We have developed a section of our website dedicated to Distance Learning (Distance Learning Tab)...see video link below for more explanation. Links to learning guides, included below, will provide detail by grade level. We will see you Monday....virtually!

p.span: Below is a link to a page that is devoted to updates from Catoosa Public Schools regarding the state mandated extension of Spring Break due to the Covid-19 Outbreak. This page will be updated as needed with further information.
